title: Summarization Engine
purpose: Generate summaries or highlighted points from the extracted text.
functional_requirements: Integrate with a Language Model (via API or local inference).
Provide concise summaries, bullet-point highlights, or structured overviews.
Ensure summarization can be customized (length, style, detail-level).

components.name: Summarization Service
components.description: Coordinates with the LLM, receives text sections, returns summaries.

components.name: API Layer
components.description: Manages requests, handles LLM responses, and enforces rate limits or tokens usage.
